website_summaries.verdict: Doesn't offer the square footage of other products, but it's easy to use in a small size.
pros: Ships with two rolls of industrial stretch wrap, so two people can work at the same time
Mini-size roll at five inches in width
Handle on the roll makes it easier to grip and use than wider rolls
Each roll contains 1,000 feet of length
cons: With its narrow width, provides a smaller coverage area than other wrap products

customer_reviews.title: Get it, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING!! We’ve moved every year for the last 5 years (no we’re not on the run, just demanding jobs. Lol) so I know a thing or two about packing. After the third move, I had had it with tape! The end always gets lost, you misplace the scissors, etc.. So I started looking for an alternative and found this. This stuff beats tape any day!! Works not only for sealing boxes, but for wrapping paintings/pictures/plaques etc. and no scissors needed! It makes the job easier and so much faster. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: This!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cause I was packing/moving a 3 bedroom townhouse. This went a long way (still have some left) and it saved time on packing/up packing. Instead of packing drawers, pictures frames, makeup and the little things like screws and and parts on a curtain rode, I wrapped it together. To unpack all I did wasn’t cut the wrap off. It held itself together well without tape. It feels comfortable holding. Zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Free SpiritedTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good Product....but Hard for Women to Hold
customer_reviews.text: I was moving and wanted to secure the large plastic tubs I was using because the lids kept popping open. Did hold the lids on. I gave it only four stars because the handle on it is way too big for a women's hand. I had to hold the handle with two hands. Made it very hard to get the first wrap around the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Reads A Lot

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Price
customer_reviews.text: Moving across country can require a lot of items, most of which i bought on Amazon. Buying these things on amazon save money. These little Shrink Wrap thing came in handy for securing myto the furniture i was moving. I also used it to bundle up some odds and ends, mostly poles. I'd highly recommend this product. Just know that its not a self spinning item. And you might get a bit dizzy walking in circle around the stuff you're wrapping up.
customer_reviews.author: Freytag

customer_reviews.title: Packing plastic crazy lady
customer_reviews.text: Game changer!! I am so happy I came across this for our recent move! It seriously was my main toy/tool. I wrapped up EVERYTHING I could think of - clothes hanging in the closet? Wrap it up! Books still in bookcase? Wrap it up! But it’s too heavy you say? Pack up the books then put lighter things in the bookcase and... you guessed it, WRAP IT UP! Even though I went packing plastic crazy, I still had a lot leftover so this was a great value to me.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving!!
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved and we used this stretch wrap for a lot of our stuff. We used it to... Wrap up rolled area rugs, secure banker boxes, wrap blankets around lamps, wrapped file cabinets to keep drawers shut, wrapped storage containers to keep the lids on, and on and on. We used it in place of twine and rope and it works great. I still have about a half a roll and will be using it for other stuff down the road where I would normally use twine. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindlekid

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew there was a large version of sandwich wrap that could be used for just about anything? It comes in handy for securing all kinds of things and organizing too, such as a small appliance that has parts with it. In the past I would have put the parts in a bag then put them into a box with the appliance. Now I can just put the parts inside with the appliance in the wrap, and I can see what it is through the clear wrap. Before wrapping our furniture I will get the large spool.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Luebbert

customer_reviews.title: Good Product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We are moving and using reusable boxes to shuttle household stuff from one place to another. I did not want to use strapping tape because it is notorious for marring the boxes and cannot be removed easily. I picked up a couple of Mighty Gadget mini wraps to use instead. The product goes on easy, takes quite a stretch and a few wraps over each end of the box and it is secure. When you get to the part of unpacking just stretch the wraps a bit and slide them off the box. No marring or damage to the box. The product works well and a roll goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: fillmore44

customer_reviews.title: It’s a bargain
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was great. I used a mile of it wrapping big and small items for moving. Worked a week using just one roll and the order came w two. Indispensable. Easy to restart after tearing off yet strong enough to cinch tight. Used it to bundle odd lengths of wood, rugs, bar clamps, paper cylinders and walking sticks. After wrapping w bubble wrap instead of tape. If you can think of a purpose this will likely fill it.
customer_reviews.author: nic dumas

customer_reviews.title: Nice for wrapping odd items for storage.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to wrap items that are stored outside, like an outdoor carpet on a lake pier. Previously wasps would build nests inside the rolled up carpet as they are placed up in the roof's rafters. This keeps the wasps from getting inside (and giving me a great surprise next spring!). There is plenty on the roll, so make extra wraps to be sure it seals up well.
customer_reviews.author: Meadow01

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wrap for securing smaller objects together!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It's easy for anyone to use; secures small and medium objects together or keeps contents in and isn't too static! I've worked with wrap that has too much static and the edges cling together and one ends up with a mess that has to be thrown away... Not this wrap. Economical and effective. Thank you! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Any Move!
customer_reviews.text: I have a collection of Spooky Town buildings and as I'm moving across the country I didn't want to fill a lot of boxes with smaller boxes. Instead, I bought these and wrapped the Spooky Town boxes in the wrap and it proved an excellent plan! The plastic unwinds easily from the roll when you need it, it stretches well and holds itself and the items in place. This is really an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Techy

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: The handle makes it so easy to use. I usually get the moving pads a day or two before I move and wrap everything in advance of the movers arriving. I used about 48 furniture pads that were wrapped extremely well. Still have almost a full one left over. I'd rather have too much the night before a move than not enough. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MonyMommy

customer_reviews.title: And then I used them for EVERYTHING because this stuff is AMAZING. And then I thought I should order more ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't think I'd use these all that much. And then I used them for EVERYTHING because this stuff is AMAZING. And then I thought I should order more because I'd surely run out because I used it for EVERYTHING. And then I didn't even finish one roll because I'm pretty sure it's infinite. My only complaint is that the handle should be on the opposite site because I feel like this might have been for left handed people, but here I am post-move and still raving so take that as you will.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Moving Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: My moving pod and car were packed so tightly, we ended up having to wrap single and small multiple items just to fit everything in. This product protected everything from large furniture to the smallest items, while sticking well to itself and tearing off easily without scissors. It held protective covers in place and eliminated the need for boxes in many cases. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: A moving day must!
customer_reviews.text: You should not move without this. It has so many uses, holds stuff together, large stuff and small, Dishes, clothes, boxes, you name it. Easy to remove. The only bad thing is it's plastic... but this makes so many little, loose moving day trifles so much easier. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Kismetmiao

customer_reviews.title: If you're packing...BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're packing to move or store anything away, BUY THIS PRODUCT!! It took a few items before I got the hang of it, but once I did, packing was a breeze. Actually, packing stinks, but this made it bearable. I was originally using it for breakable items, but the realized a quick wrap on all items made everything in the box stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Very good for moving
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Had to use these when we moved to wrap up our furniture and electronics. Stuck nicely to itself and lasted several weeks without a hint of letting go. Items came nicely packaged and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really A Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: This product really proved to be a time saver. I was able to quickly wrap my electronics, and other movable items. It helped make my move less stressful. I hope that I won’t be moving anytime soon but if I need to I will most definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Shortyfatleggs

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this stuff?
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must! I don’t know how I’ve lived without it. I was moving and this was essential for keeping dishes together, wrapping fragile items, keeping drawers from opening, keeping Christmas items together, wrapping everything!!! Great product, great price and it arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Westie

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This shrink wrap comes in handy for many jobs, wrapping artificial Christmas tree sections, securing items which are unboxed and wish to store, securing garden stakes together for storing. the list is endless. The item works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Platarote

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for moving!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, just wish it tore a bit easier. Perfect for packing, would totally buy again, easy to use and great price! It really helps to combine like things together, whether it is cutlery, keeping pots and lids stable during the move etc.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: This stuff was awesome! It is easy to handle and with larger ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was awesome! It is easy to handle and with larger objects can be passed to a second person when wrapping. It is also great for smaller items that you want to keep together. For example, the silverware in the tray, just wrap all together. It also goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: smile4ufromtlc

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for anyone moving
customer_reviews.text: These work great. It was especially useful to keep big tubs sealed as we packed our stuff for the move. We also used to keep the bubble wrap in place for the fragile items. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mel B

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I will never move again without this product! It took a couple of times to get the hang of it but after that, it was a breeze. We wrapped boxes, tubs and furniture (wrapped in blankets, not directly on the furniture).
customer_reviews.author: fourbohans

customer_reviews.title: Great help from this handy wrap!
customer_reviews.text: Great handy wrap for my move! Glad to know the product through many good reviews shared from Amazon.com. Have exceeded my expectations, as it’s easy and great help in packing especially holding the plates together with some clean kitchen roll papers in between. Happy and satisfied using this product.
customer_reviews.author: wellbeing65

customer_reviews.title: These were great. Moved cross country and had a lot to ...
customer_reviews.text: These were great. Moved cross country and had a lot to pack. This made it easy to keep protective wrapping around odd shaped things, used it to hold folding chairs together, around art work and much more. Definitely a must for anyone moving.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for keeping around house stuff neat shrinking bulk items for better storage space, and some other fun uses, but good product, strong,

I also wrapped smaller picture frames together. It made packing and unpacking much quicker. Organization bins I had in the bathroom I just wrapped the whole thing with out having to put them in boxes. This stuff goes a long way I still have one whole roll and quite a bit left on the other. I will never move with out this stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought!

customer_reviews.title: they make moving so much easier

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: Product is very good. the only thing is, I wish the roller rotates from the handle. The handle is connected to the roll so when you are using it, the handle spins inside your hand. The product itself is really good though.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for everything when I move. keeps everything together so well. better than using tape.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Stuff worked great! We used it for a recent move and I also used it to to wrap up some of my Christmas wall decor.

customer_reviews.title: If you’re moving, you need these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for moving, and I got much appreciation from my roommates for being such a genius! This wrapping is so helpful! We ended up using it for so much more than we expected (wrapping up boxes, drawers, rugs, etc.). Very pleased and wouldn’t move again without them.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my move, worked well to protect my pictures and keep my metal bookcase pieces together which made moving and unpacking a great deal easier then it has been in the past.

customer_reviews.title: Useful

customer_reviews.text: They are great to pack my small breakables. The handles made it easier to wrap the item. Crazy love shrink wrap. I used to pack items for a living. Love the ease of use and size!

customer_reviews.title: Makes packing so much easier.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used these for our last move, and they made life so much easier. Some things are difficult to wrap or don't need boxes, and tape is just messy and hard to use. This is great for keeping things secure, and cheap.

product_meta.title: 2 Pack of Mighty Gadget (R) Industrial Mini Stretch Wrap Film with Handle for Pallet Wrap, Moving Supplies Stretch Wrap & Shrink Wrap - 80 Gauge, 5” x 1000 ft
product_meta.description:
When your belongings are on the move, secure them together so they won’t get lost by using Mighty Gadget’s mini stretch films. These Stretch Wrap is quite handy for bundling small items, corrugated shipping boxes together for both storage and shipments through its excellent self-adhering film. Our Stretch Wrap is perfect for storage or shipping and it sticks to itself without leaving any messy residue when it is time to unpack. Great for wrapping remote controls to TVs; securing cabinet doors and dresser drawers closed; keeping hardware attached to bed frames; protecting plush furniture from dust or stains; and shielding surfaces or furniture legs from scratches, scuffs and damage.
